writer.name: 弗拉基米尔·马雅可夫斯基 Vladimir Mayakovsky
鲍里斯·帕斯捷尔纳克 Boris Pasternak
卡尔梅洛·贝内 Carmelo Bene
谢尔盖·叶赛宁 Sergei Yesenin

director.name: 卡尔梅洛·贝内 Carmelo Bene

this_title: Bene! Quattro diversi modi di morire in versi: Majakovskij-Blok-Esènin-Pasternak
introduction: Performance shot in 1977, in which emblematic actor Carmelo Bene, in the charming reconstruction of the ruins of a theater on fire accompanied by the disturbing notes of Vittorio Gelmetti, reads four poems of the Twentieth Century russian poets Vladimir Majakovskij, Boris Pasternak, Aleksandr Blok and Sergej Esènin.
chinese_title: Bene! Quattro diversi modi di morire in versi: Majakovskij-Blok-Esènin-Pasternak
